title: Ep 373 | Jaseâ€™s New Grandchild Puts Him in a Tough Situation & an Unlikely Hunting Loophole
description:
Jase's grandchild hasn't even been born, and Jase already faces a predicament. Al and Jase reminisce about an old hunting loophole that allowed them to hunt anywhere they wanted. Phil and Jase talk about why there has to be desperation and brokenness when you come to Jesus. Jase discovers that his interpreter added words to his speech. And Al and Jase discuss how they get their points across to people who speak a different language.
